title: Begin Here
description: Place for first time users of the forums

discusion.title: Become a Beta Tester!
discusion.description: A few years ago I was treated for stomach cancer (part of my stomach was removed).After that, I started endurance sports like running and biking.As I only have half a stomach, I found that a plant based diet works well as most of that food is very light and does not give me troubles.Thing is, according to the goverment website here (Netherlands) I need 80 kgs x 0.83 = 66.4 gr of protein. Cronometer, based on a lightly active setting has me on 144 gr per day.I am surely doing something wrong somewhere, but where? Perhaps a setting?

comments.author: Ram
comments.description: We would love to hear your suggestions @MarylnRDN ! The beta test program is only for the mobile app users right now (Pro is only available on the website), but feel free to sign up anyways to give your own personal feedback, and feel free to email us or post on this forum your suggestions for how to make the Pro version better as well!

comments.author: Syam
comments.description: We would love to hear your suggestions @MarylnRDN ! The beta test program is only for the mobile app users right now (Pro is only available on the website), but feel free to sign up anyways to give your own personal feedback, and feel free to email us or post on this forum your suggestions for how to make the Pro version better as well!

discusion.title: Become a Beta Tester!
discusion.description: A few years ago I was treated for stomach cancer (part of my stomach was removed).After that, I started endurance sports like running and biking.As I only have half a stomach, I found that a plant based diet works well as most of that food is very light and does not give me troubles.Thing is, according to the goverment website here (Netherlands) I need 80 kgs x 0.83 = 66.4 gr of protein. Cronometer, based on a lightly active setting has me on 144 gr per day.I am surely doing something wrong somewhere, but where? Perhaps a setting?

The beta test program is only for the mobile app users right now (Pro is only available on the website), but feel free to sign up anyways to give your own personal feedback, and feel free to email us or post on this forum your suggestions for how to make the Pro version better as well!

discusion.author: Gopal

discusion.title: Become a Beta Tester!
discusion.description: A few years ago I was treated for stomach cancer (part of my stomach was removed).After that, I started endurance sports like running and biking.As I only have half a stomach, I found that a plant based diet works well as most of that food is very light and does not give me troubles.Thing is, according to the goverment website here (Netherlands) I need 80 kgs x 0.83 = 66.4 gr of protein. Cronometer, based on a lightly active setting has me on 144 gr per day.I am surely doing something wrong somewhere, but where? Perhaps a setting?
